00022 /**
00023  * @file   MultiQuantMethodListener.h
00024  * @author Alan Williams
00025  * @date   Fri Jan  4 16:31:26 PST 2008
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for reporting results from multiple quantification methods
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _MULTIQUANTMETHODLISTENER_H_
00030 #define _MULTIQUANTMETHODLISTENER_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/AnalysisInfo.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/AnalysisStream.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00037 //
00038 #include "util/Util.h"
00039 //
00040 #include <cstdlib>
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 //
00043 
00044 /**
00045  *   Class for reporting results of quantification methods.
00046  */
00047 class MultiQuantMethodListener : public QuantMethodReport {
00048 
00049 public:
00050   
00051   /** Constructor. */
00052   MultiQuantMethodListener() { }
00053 
00054   /** Destructor. */
00055   ~MultiQuantMethodListener() { }
00056 
00057   /** 
00058    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00059    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00060    * 
00061    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00062    * 
00063    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00064    */
00065   bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart);
00066 
00067   /** 
00068    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00069    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00070    * 
00071    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00072    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00073    * 
00074    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00075    */
00076   bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00077               const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00078               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00079 
00080   /** 
00081    * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00082    * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00083    * 
00084    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00085    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00086    * 
00087    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00088    */
00089    bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00090                       const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00091                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00092 
00093   /** 
00094    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00095    * results and clean up.
00096    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00097    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00098    */
00099   bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod);
00100 
00101   // Buffer the current set of results
00102   std::vector<std::vector<double> > m_Results;
00103 
00104 private:
00105 };
00106 
00107 #endif /* _MULTIQUANTMETHODLISTENER_H_ */
